snippet.title: Eames Lounge and Ottoman - Lounge Chair \- Herman Miller
snippet.description: The comfort built into the Eames lounge chair and ottoman helps explain its enduring popularity, compared to other chairs that are also considered icons of 20th century design. The foam cushions mimic the look and feel of the original but will not flatten or clump over time.

snippet.title: DWR \- Eames® Lounge and Ottoman - Design Within Reach
snippet.description: Charles and Ray Eames had ideas about making a better world, one in which things were designed to bring greater pleasure to our lives. Their iconic Eames Lounge Chair ...

snippet.title: Eames® Molded Plastic Chairs with Chrome Wire Base - Chairs ...
snippet.description: Eames chair is a midcentury modern chair and mixes with modern dining room furniture.

snippet.title: Herman Miller Eames Lounge Chair ES670 and ES671 - SmartFurniture.com
snippet.description: This is the Emperor of all lounge chairs. It's truly one of the most famous and well-respected chairs ever built, and now it can be yours through Smart Furniture and Herman Miller (Herman Miller secured the rights to sell Eames furniture, and there isn't a more fine or trustworthy furniture company out there).

snippet.title: Eames LCW Chair \- Kids Replica - Little Nest USA
snippet.description: What could be more beautiful than scaled down mid century classic chairs suitable for children. House and Garden Australia. The Woody chair by Little Nest is a little plywood chair based on the popular LCW chair which was originally designed by Ray and Charles Eames. 30 day returns.

snippet.title: Eames Lounge Chair \- Wikipedia
snippet.description: This differentiates the newer chairs from the "original" (vintage) chairs which used Brazilian rosewood veneers and were constructed of five layers of plywood. This is part of the chair's unusual design, as well as its weakest link.

snippet.title: Herman Miller ® Eames Chair and Ottoman - Wayfair
snippet.description: Its heritage goes back to the molded plywood chairs pioneered by the Eameses in the 1940s, and It's part of the permanent collection of New York's Museum of Modern Art. Living Room Chairs. We bought two of these beautiful chairs in the parchment leather and they are beautiful, we love them.

snippet.title: Eames & Saarinen Organic Chair \- hivemodern.com
snippet.description: Eames & saarinen organic chair. Modern design for the home. Design Charles Eames & Eero Saarinen, 1940 Laminate seat shell, beech legs, upholstery Made in Germany by Vitra.

snippet.title: Eames chair \- Define Eames chair at Dictionary.com
snippet.description: Also called LCM chair. A side chair designed by Charles Eames in 1946, having a slender tubular steel frame with a seat and back of molded plywood panels. Also called Eames lounge chair.

snippet.title: Herman Miller - Herman Miller Eames Lounge Chair and Ottoman - 3350-600-13
snippet.description: Herman Miller Eames Lounge Chair and Ottoman. Canada CAD English. Ottoman/Repose-pieds 26"w x 21.5"d x 17.25h. Designed by Charles and Ray Eames when introduced in 1956 the Eames Lounge Chair and Ottoman was one of a kind.
